about_the_game:
In the game, you can enjoy the chess matches with the pretty Lady Bongcloud.
She is generous, cute, and loves "Bongcloud Attack", in which the king moves first and goes forward to show his bravery.

With Lady Bongcloud as your opponent, you can experience a novel chess encounters. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned chess champion, Lady Bongcloud can adapt to you, making each match a delightful and fulfilling experience. She generously shares her expertise to beat you and may even offer hints to help you improve your gameplay, as your chess teacher.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains bunny girl and bikini costume

detailed_description:
In the game, you can enjoy the chess matches with the pretty Lady Bongcloud.
She is generous, cute, and loves "Bongcloud Attack", in which the king moves first and goes forward to show his bravery.

With Lady Bongcloud as your opponent, you can experience a novel chess encounters. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned chess champion, Lady Bongcloud can adapt to you, making each match a delightful and fulfilling experience. She generously shares her expertise to beat you and may even offer hints to help you improve your gameplay, as your chess teacher.
legal_notice:
The game code is released under the GNU GPL v3.0.
This game makes use of the following open source technologies, which are available under the following licenses. for details see license.txt in the install directory.
pygame,Stockfish Chess, python-chess, stockfish(python wrapper by zhelyabuzhsky)
pygame is available under the LGPL License.
Stockfish, python-chess is available under the GPL V3 License.
stockfish(python wrapper) is available under the MIT License.

a Stockfish binary has been bundled as stockfish-windows-2022-x86-64-avx2.exe.
No modifications have been made to the source code of pygame, Stockfish, python-chess, Pyside2
name: Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Processor: 4 cores Haswell processors
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Processor: 4 cores Broadwell processors
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3+

short_description: Lady Bongcloud... She is generous, cute, and loves the "Bongcloud Attack", in which the king moves first and goes forward to show his bravery.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
